document_title: Metastatic stomach cancer: Symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: ung-thu-da-day-di-can.json_5_Nutritional care for patients with metastatic gastric cancer
subsection_content:
Stomach cancer causes many obstacles for patients in eating and digesting food. This can cause malnutrition in cancer patients. Therefore, patients need nutritional advice from a doctor to develop a daily menu suitable for their health condition. Supportive drugs, pain relievers or other drugs can be prescribed when necessary.

Metastatic stage of stomach cancer progresses complicatedly because the tumors have spread to many places, causing many serious symptoms for patients. Patients need an appropriate treatment plan, and a focus on improving quality of life should be a top priority.
